title: Charming 4+2 Bungalow w/ Lovely Garden in Echo Park!
posting_body: This two-level charming bungalow in Echo Park features 4 bedrooms, 2 bathrooms, and a generous indoor/outdoor bonus space (~350 additional sq ft) with sliding doors leading out to a lush and terraced backyard.
The renovated single family residence boasts tall ceilings, wood flooring, vintage light fixtures, built-in bookshelves and a custom-made hearth.
An abundance of windows provide plenty of sunlight, a nice breeze throughout the house, and treetop views to the Downtown LA skyline.
Outside find a brick dining patio, grassy lounging areas, native landscaping and multiple fruit trees (guava, lemon, orange, mulberry, and fig).
Other highlights to note - Wolf oven, Bosch fridge, Samsung washer/dryer, central air/heat, and off street parking for 2+ cars.
Last but not least, this location earns a 96 walk score and is around the corner from Elysian park, grocery stores, cafes, restaurants.$6000/month and available for a September 1st move in.
Can be rented with furniture pictured, partially furnished, or unfurnished.
Presented by Austen Lee w/ Concrete Real Estate.
